alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 1:52AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 1 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Pierce, Elk River, Dixie, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
